ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: This candidate has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 14 years. During this candidate's last employment this candidate was working as a Sr. IT QA Consultant at BLUE CROSS BLUE SHIELD. This candidate has extensive knowledge of SQL, Oracle, UNIX, Oracle PL/SQL, Java, IBM AS400 Hardware, Sun Solaris, SQLPlus, Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft Access, Rational ClearQuest, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Internet Explorer, Mercury Interactive TestDirector, HTML, HP Quality Center, shell scripting, WebSphere MQ Portal, Visual FoxPro, Visual Basic, TOAD, Sybase, Seagate Crystal Reports, PowerBuilder, Poet, PVCS, Oracle 9i, Oracle 11g, Microsoft SQL Server 6.5, Microsoft DOS, Mercury Interactive Quicktest, IBM WebSphere Application Server, DB2, C Programming Language, AIX UNIX, Web Services, UltraEdit 32 4.3, Together, TextPad 4.5, SunOS, Staffware, Siebel Tools, Secure Shell, SUN Hardware, Regression Testing, Rapid SQL 7.2, Oracle Projects, Oracle 8, Oracle 7, Object Oriented Database, ORACLE QA, Novell Netware, Microsoft Visio, Microsoft Project, Mercury Quality Center, Lotus Notes/Domino, Kofax Capture, JSWDK 1.0.1, Ipswitch WS_FTP Pro, IBM WebSphere, IBM RS6000 Hardware, Dinamo, Data Centre, DB II v10, ColdFusion, Cognos Impromptu, Client/Server, CICS/ESA, Borland JBuilder. This candidate has an extensive management experience (8.4 years).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2008-08 for 39 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Project Manager/Test Manager. Since 2004-06 for 12 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Test Coordinator/Test Manager at WELLS FARGO HOME MORTGAGES. Since 2003-06 for 12 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Test Coordinator/Test Manager at BLUE CROSS BLUE SHIELD. Since 2002-11 for 6 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Lead System Test Analyst/Test Manager at ANALYSTS INTERNATIONAL. Since 1999-11 for 20 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Senior E-commerce Application Test Lead/Test Manager at INTEGRATION, INC.. Since 1998-07 for 12 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Client-Server Test Lead/Test Manager at WELLS FARGO.
